title: mystery boxes
body:
Hello all, I'm enjoying the mystery skin event  like everyone else I'm sure and I'm wondering exactly what skins are available through this option because I recently opened a riot graves skin, are all riot skins available? Riot blitz\kayle for instance?

Thanks for any responces!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

From the [Mystery Gifting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752934-Mystery-Gifting-FAQ): 

*A skin for any Champion that your friend owns is eligible for Mystery Gifting, as long as it's worth at least 520 RP and is available in the store. This includes Legendary and even Ultimate skins! Legacy skins will also be obtainable as a Mystery Skin EXCEPT Achievement skins, Collector's Edition skins, PAX skins, Rusty Blitzcrank, Urf the Manatee, Championship Riven and Riot Squad Singed.*

Hope this clears things up! :]

Okay, thanks Khaos! I'm glad that these posts get such fast responses!

Edit:Riot KateyKhaos, I just reread you're reply and I noticed that you Were referring to the **mystery gifting option**. I am wanting to know about the **mystery skin event**; where you buy a mystery skin for yourself and not your friends. The event until March 24th, 2015. Do the same rules apply?

Any skin that was available for purchase directly in game is obtainable. This means any legacy skins like the riot skins, holiday skins, and team skins.

Skins that are NOT available are ones only handed out at events. (Championship Riven, PAX skins, King rammus)
